reason: This point has been judged irrelevant because the requirement of providing true information is a reasonable expectation for a service to have for their users.
title: You must use your real name to register

tosdr.tldr: When registering for Cloudant and creating your username and password, you must provide true, accurate, current, and complete information. This includes a real name.
